 </BrowserRouter>
 </React.StrictMode>
)

// App.jsx
import { Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom'
import Home from './pages/Home'
import About from './pages/About'
import Contact from './pages/Contact'
import Navbar from './components/Navbar'

function App() {
 return (
 <div className="app">

 <Routes>
 <Route path="/" element={<Home />} />
 <Route path="/about" element={<About />} />
 <Route path="/contact" element={<Contact />} />
 </Routes>
 </div>
 )
}

export default App

import { useParams, useSearchParams } from 'react-router-dom'

function UserProfile() {
 // è·å–è·¯å¾„å‚æ•°
 const { userId } = useParams()
 
 // è·å–æŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°
 const [searchParams, setSearchParams] = useSearchParams()
 const tab = searchParams.get('tab')
 const sort = searchParams.get('sort')

 const updateQueryParams = () => {
 setSearchParams({ tab: 'info', sort: 'asc' })
 }

 return (
 <div>
 <h1>ç”¨æˆ·èµ„æ–™: {userId}</h1>
 <p>å½“å‰æ ‡ç­¾: {tab}</p>
 <button onClick={updateQueryParams}>æ›´æ–°æŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°</button>

}

// components/LoginForm.jsx
import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'

function LoginForm() {
 const navigate = useNavigate()
 const location = useLocation()

 const handleLogin = async () => {
 try {
 // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç™»å½•é€»è¾‘
 await loginUser()
 
 // ç™»å½•åè·³è½¬
 const from = location.state?.from?.pathname || '/dashboard'
 navigate(from, { replace: true })
 
 // å…¶ä»–å¯¼èˆªæ–¹å¼
 // navigate(-1) // è¿”å›ä¸Šä¸€é¡µ
 // navigate('/dashboard', { state: { user: userData } }) // ä¼ é€’çŠ¶æ€
 } catch (error) {
 console.error('ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥')
 }
 }

 return (
 <form onSubmit={(e) => {
 e.preventDefault()
 handleLogin()
 }}>
 {/* è¡¨å•å†…å®¹ */}
 <button type="submit">ç™»å½•</button>
 </form>
 )
}

1. è·¯ç”±ä¿æŠ¤ç»„ä»¶#

// components/ProtectedRoute.jsx
import { Navigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'

function ProtectedRoute({ children, requiredRole }) {
 const location = useLocation()
 const { user, isAuthenticated } = useAuth() // å‡è®¾æœ‰è®¤è¯ Hook

 if (!isAuthenticated) {
 // é‡å®šå‘åˆ°ç™»å½•é¡µï¼Œå¹¶ä¿å­˜å½“å‰ä½ç½®ä»¥ä¾¿ç™»å½•åè¿”å›
 return <Navigate to="/login" state={{ from: location }} replace />
 }

 if (requiredRole && user.role !== requiredRole) {
 // æƒé™ä¸è¶³
 return <Navigate to="/unauthorized" replace />
 }

 return children
}

2. ä½¿ç”¨ä¿æŠ¤è·¯ç”±#

// App.jsx
<Routes>
 <Route path="/admin" element={
 <ProtectedRoute requiredRole="admin">
 <AdminLayout />
 </ProtectedRoute>
 }>
 <Route index element={<AdminDashboard />} />
 <Route path="users" element={<UserManagement />} />
 </Route>
 
 <Route path="/profile" element={
 <ProtectedRoute>
 <UserProfile />
 </ProtectedRoute>
 } />
</Routes>

item.title: Icon Composer
item.description: Icon Composer lets you create layered icons out of Liquid Glass from a single design for iPhone, iPad, Mac, and AppleÂ Watch. With a new multi-layer icon format, you can easily adjust LiquidÂ Glass properties, preview with dynamic lighting effects, and annotate across appearance modes. IconÂ Composer is designed to work seamlessly with Xcode, and also provides the option to export a flattened version of your icon for marketing and communicationÂ needs.

item.title: Icon Maker by Raycast
item.description:
This repository contains the source code forÂ ray.so, a collection of tools built byÂ Raycast. It includes:

  • Code Images: Create beautiful images of your code.
  • Icon Maker: Create beautiful icons for Raycast Extensions.
  • Prompt Explorer: Explore AI Prompts for Raycast.
  • Preset Explorer: Explore AI Presets for Raycast.
  • Quicklink Explorer: Browse and import Raycast Quicklinks.
  • Snippet Explorer: Browse and import Raycast Snippets.
  • Theme Explorer: Browse and import Raycast Themes.

é¡¹ç›®åœ°å€#
